org.apache.flink.graph.pregel

类 MessageCombiner<K,Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.graph.pregel.MessageCombiner<K,Message>
  • 类型参数:
    K - The type of the vertex id
    Message - The type of the message sent between vertices along the edges.
    所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    PregelSSSP.SSSPCombiner

    public abstract class MessageCombiner<K,Message>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The base class for combining messages sent during a VertexCentricIteration.

      • combineMessages

        public abstract void combineMessages(MessageIterator<Message> messages)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Combines messages sent from different vertices to a target vertex. Implementing this method might reduce communication costs during a vertex-centric iteration.
        参数:
        messages - the input messages to combine
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • sendCombinedMessage

        public final void sendCombinedMessage(Message combinedMessage)
        Sends the combined message to the target vertex.
        参数:
        combinedMessage -
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
